content: This is an excellent player. I especially love the ability to speed up in the paid version. Developer is very response to ideas too.
I use it daily and it is great for audiobooks and podcasts.
Simple and plays everything perfectly. Best AB player I've used so far.
Clear, intuitive interface. It has everything you need for listening to audio files: resume, bookmark across files. Variable speed is a real plus too.
Very pleasant design and contain all the necessary functions.
Upgraded from free version solely to reward developer for their work. Great player.
Only real improvement would be to allow setting if the app opens whenever BT connects. Having it always reappear in my notifications area is a bit annoying!
replyContent: Check whether "Remote buttons :: React when app is closed" setting is disabled. Your BT device is likely sending a remote button event when it connects.

content: Excellent for blind person.
Good
Simple interface. Highly functional. Gets out of the way so you can enjoy your audiobooks.
Extremely useful app. Clean design and simple. Are my bookmarks saved anywhere? I want to switch phones and would love to understand how to sync my bookmarks
Great and worth the money. Wonder if it would support Android 11's quick setting media controls.
replyContent: Go to Simple ABP settings and check "Standard style of media notification". Then these media controls should show up.

content: Great app! Could you add the timeline to the lock screen?
Pretty convenient! Can you update the app so that the bookmarks can collapse and expand? It's difficult to manage them or scroll through them when there are lots of bookmarks for each audio files.

Love the app only thing I wish that wasn't on by default was the sleep mode or DP. Somehow the app was making every audio player go into this mode and couldn't figure it out till I started looking at the new UI. Please guys this is a dumb feature to have on by default! Please change it.
replyContent: Simple ABP doesn't (and can't) make other audio players go into sleep mode. DP is disabled by default for new installs since around a year ago.

content: Big control. All necessary features.Had to go for full version to have equalizer. Works very well.
Really good player. Especially like the auto off feature which will pause playback if mobile not touched /moved for some time.
The app has been doing fine until recently: when I click my headset twice it seeks forward +10 secs even though I'm adjusting it to -10 secs.
replyContent: There weren't any changes to remote button handling in many months. Something must have changed on your end.

content: Absolute beauty .. Thank you.
Great Audio book player. Exactly as the name suggests.

Simple non nonsense interface. Very reliable so far. I've just paid for the full version, not because I need the features but as a programmer I appreciate the effort that goes into coding good quality apps. Highly recommended!
Perfect player. One thing that would be nice is a way to change white color to another softer color or contrast control for night time use.
Progress by mp3 file, playback speed, literally all I want
A very simple player that does everything I need when playing my mp3 audiobooks. And no adds.

Awesome Little Book Reader. An uncomplicated book reader that does what it says on the tin. Buy the pro version for speed tools. The interface looks basic but at the same time it's very powerful, uncluttered and easy to use. Try the free version first, you won't be disappointed. Highly recommended.
Excellent app; includes equalizer & variable speed playback. Ad-free. It Just Works. One of my Top Ten apps. Recommended.
Sometimes, too often in fact, the app will skip ahead quite far when a chapter is finished. I've had it skip whole chapters before.
replyContent: Were these chapters started before? If chapter wasn't finished, playback resumes from last position after previous chapter is finished.

content: Simple and very easy to use. One of the best audio players.
No nonsense UI that just works. Best audiobook player by far
Such a good app
Brilliant app .... And it even works on Android Auto!

Now this is a quality app. Simple to use, but exceptionally robust. The seeker function is precise; continuing after a pause is fast and reliable; no unnecessary app permissions; lightweight; not one crash since ever.
Simple, easy, fast. Perfect.
Easy to use.., :)
Easy to use, without unnecessary frills.

Best Audio Player! Best for reviewing class audio. My only suggestion is to create the ability to long press the in app seek buttons to change the amount of time we can seek rather than going through a few additional steps in settings options. Also a repeat A and B option would be good too. As long as you leave the seek buttons large, that in part is what makes this app frustration free.
Easy to use and it does everything I need it to do.
Best one I have used, simple and intuitive.
Good, simple, perfect
Fantastic.
Great app, easy to use and see without the need to wear glasses all the time to operate it
Best of all.
Best app of its kind.
Exactly what I have been looking for for several years. Well done to the developer. Does an excellent job with no uneccessary Bella and whistles.
Does everything I could want, just found this app , best one that I have used being a 20 year audiobook fan!

A great utilitarian audiobook player. There was a little bit of a learning curve, but once I got it all figured out I got to say, I love it. I've tried a handful of other audiobook apps and was constantly wanting better functionality while being simple to use. It's not flashy, yet does everything you need. Also, I emailed the app customer service with a functionality question and received an answer in less than an hour.
A perfect blend of functionality and minimalism. Just perfect!
I've used this player for over a year, nearly every day. This player is the best thing since sliced bread. Simple, fast, intuitive, brilliant. Absolute joy to use it.
Simple and does it's job wonderfully.

Awesome app, use it for audiobooks. Very easy to continue listening to the book , and very easy to use. Has all the features U need. I loved the free version, so I bought this app, mainly to support the Devs. Thanks heaps..
This app is fabulous so i suppose I'd better give it the whole five
Excelent app. simple.
Great little audio book player. Well worth the money.
Love this app improvement would be to add a timer as usually listen to books on a night time, if this functionality was added on an up would give it 5 stars.
replyContent: There is already a timer in "Delayed pause" section (DP button at the bottom of the main screen).

content: Great app, simple to use, with all the features I want and a little more. All while retaining a sleek UI.
Great app. Works very well.
Bought this to support the developer, I used the free version for so long and this app is so great!
Does what I need without a heap of stuff l don't want
Great

This app was obviously made by someone who considers functionality and usability to be of the utmost importance. This app is so much more smartly arranged than all the others I've tried. I really appreciate the clean and straightforward interface. Minor complaints (five stars even with them): The simple monochrome UI is great but my eyes sometimes struggle to read the text. I don't know if it's my old eyes or the giant pictures with normal sized text... It would also be really nice if the book progression (as displayed in the app, which is awesome) was displayed the same way in Android Auto. Not sure if that's even possible though. Again the app is so smart it was a no-brainer to buy. Thanks for thinking through every aspect of what a good app should be like, when so many people do not.
Thank you it is now working again
replyContent:
There were no changes to remote button handling in Simple ABP. Have you had Android updates recently?
Update:
Are there any apps on your device that are able to detect double click?

content: This is by far my favourite audiobook player, the only thing I'm missing is the cast function. With that the app would've been 10/10
Very useful app for audio books! I really enjoy it!
My only complaint is that there is no sleep function
replyContent: What do you mean by "sleep function"? Have you looked at "Delayed pause" ("DP" button on the main screen)?

content: The best audiobook player I've ever used.
The best audiobook playback app I've tried! The only way it could be better is if it read cue files for chapter breaks in single file books. I love how small the app is and how much I can customize.
Immediately better than everything else I've used

Love the app. But why is 'resume on replug' only 10seconds after unplug?! I want it to resume when ever i plugin my headphones. I have conversations longer than that i have to not only plug my headphones in again but also manually press play. Every time. 3/5, if that wasn't the case easy 5/5. Weird choice to not make that an option.

Love the app, bitdefender doesn't. Telling me that it will possibly do bad things to my hard drive info. Update: ran the anti virus again and it no longer says that the program has issues. This app has been great btw!
replyContent: Send me a screenshot of this warning ( simple.abp@gmail.com )

content: Lightweight and ad-free, easy to use. I use it for my podcasts and it's excellent. Buttons on screen big enough to use easily while driving and surprisingly configurable. All in all a pretty good app. Also, and unusually, the app offers a pre-amp finally fixing the too-quiet connection to many Bluetooth players/speakers. That feature alone is worth gold. I bought the paid version just because I was so pleased with the free version!
Just Great!
it does its job perfectly! free version was 10/10 so i decided to buy the full version to support the creators.

Whaaaaaaat??? The free version WAS my favorite player for lectures and audiobooks. But I found out that this can play faster than 1x. So... Now this is my new favorite! üòÑüòÑüòÑ I installed and THIS player picked up where I left off on the free version. Didn't have to do anything extra, everything carried over. The app design is clean, simple user friendly and while it looks like it lacks features that's deceptive because it has almost everything you could need for audiobooks. THANK YOU DEVS!!!
Absolutely love it! I was using play music to listen to my audio books, this app is an absolute blessing, enjoy using it!
I like this app very much, but I really miss the replay button for the track. Would be so nice to add it, thanks!
Thank you!!!!!!!!! I'm grateful. This is the best cusomizable player of ever. Thanks, great job!!!

This is the best audiobook player I found, and I tried alot of them. The interface, personalisation options and features all perfectly suit my needs. To the developer: there's one thing I miss: Chromecast Audio support. Adding that would make this a 5-star review.

I'd like to be able to edit my previous review but Google Play won't give me the option. Anyway, I'm so glad the glitch has been fixed, and I'm back to listening to my audiobooks smoothly again. This is by far the best audiobook reader I've found on here.
replyContent:
Contact me at simple.abp@gmail.com, I need more details.
Update: today's version (1.7.6) should fix this issue.

content: I tried a ton of podcast players, I also use this for music too was looking for a player that can seek -+secs with just a click of the handset and customizable buttons. This player is lightning fast (opening seeking changing tracks everything!) no ads, very lightweight, no frills and meets most of my needs. I didn't necessarily need the paid version but I loved the free version so much had to show some support for great apps that arent full of ads and in-app purchases(rare these days).
A very good app. Obvious navigation, uncluttered layout, useful functions, and good email tech support. Worth the money. Recommended.
Easy to use, the app remembers when you stop even if the hand set is updated, simply love this app worth every penny even though I bought it with a ¬£2.00 credit from Google.

This is also the best app for Podcasts. I love how it remembers Your place when you switch from another Podcast or chapter. It is also very simple to navigate from one place to another. And you can organize it anyway you want to since it is based on how you set up your folder on your phone

This app does exactly what it says it does. No ads, no bloatware, just a great app that plays your audiobooks, podcasts, and any other audio you got. My 1 criticism is the way you browse for audio. Maybe add a way scan for audio.
I am disappointed, it stops the story every 2 minutes, why is it doing this
replyContent: This is impossible to fix from my end. You need to allow Simple ABP to run in the background in your device's settings.

content: Best player available.

Checked out a number of audiobook players. This one is sweet, meets or surpasses all my needs in a player, most excellent app. Proud to pay for the full version, and thanks to the developers for a solid, easy-to-use book player. The equalizer is a nice touch, btw -- adjust vocal timbre to the mood and the story. Lot of apps on my phone that I rarely or never use. This one will stay quite busy.

This app does exactly what it says it does and no bloatware. It plays audiobooks clearly and accurately, lets you pause them and make bookmarks, doesn't lose your place, and even has a history of other books so you can resume anywhere in your audio book library and listen to multiple books at once. the free version does almost everything I need and had no ads - but I bought the pro version both to support it and because I wanted an equalizer :)
Absolutely perfect app. 2 thumbs way up!!
Excellent player
perfect for all of my audio book needs. Simple. Intuative. Works every time.
Great app. Does an amazing job playing my audiobooks. Would be amazing to cast to a Chromecast/Nests like VLC can.
Simple and easy to use.
Absolutely fantastic due to its simplistic nature. Great for people who manage and sort their own audiobooks andd just need a player that works.
Best audio book app

This app is awesome and such a pleasure to use. The interface design is very clear and has nice big buttons for frequent actions. The features are great and very intuitive. And the app is built very well - it's super fast and responsive. I use this every day for my language lessons and love it. I'd happily pay triple the price for it.
Simple and yet feature reach player. Just what I was looking for to listen a book while falling asleep. Thank you for your work
Has everything I want but a replay button. I listen to bible verses with this.
Very tiny and powerfull. Can play music and audiobooks. Can change audio speed. Has its own equalizer. Very good. I am using the paid version.

I tried I handful of different audio book players, and this was the best. It has some great features, but isn't complicated. The only thing I could wish for is to be able to choose colors other than just black and white as themes. Still definitely five stars.
Simple, easy to use, easily associated to mp3 files.
best audiobook reader
Just what I've been looking for. Simple, efficient playback of MP3 audiobooks stored on my device. Well worth the price for variable speed feature.
Great app
Works and gives access to individual chapters.
Would like a casting function for tv!!
Great app for audiobooks

Awesome experience. Simple and compact. I have decided to purchase this product because I need the support. Only I am missing the casting feature. They should discriminate the paid version with the free version with the casting (TV) feature.

Perfect app to listen to audio books. Easy to navigate and control playback. Just one small bug - every once in a while, after stopping and starting playback using headphones control, audio gets all jaggery, requiring a restart of the app. Just with one specific pair of headphones, thought... I'd also wish that the play time progress would display on the lock screen. Everything else is working exactly as it ought.
Great simple app for audiobooks! (Can the feature to skip silence be added? That would be excellent! )

I was so impressed by the free version that I purchased it without hesitation after only a few minutes. This is so brilliantly done, thank you! -- Edit 2020/03/12: oh yes! Bookmarking with remote button, marvelous! You must have read my mind, I was just thinking about that the other day!üëç

Absolutely everything I wanted. Dead simple even for a newbie, yet does everything you might need for books and for music. Easiest organization I've seen. This app is so wonderful, I just wanted to purchase to support its great author.
App is great üëç but missing a way to repeat an audio.

A clean UI with just what is needed to listen to audiobooks. Very well designed. Worth buying the full version to say thanks to the developer for such an awesome app. Update... This app works perfectly with Android Auto.
Player is good. Expecting a simple square play pause widget.
Simplicity in style, great functionality.
Absolutely fantastic. Simple without any extra useless frills. Better than the audible app in my honest opinion. Thank you.
Amazing, simple to use playback and bookmarks features included.
Im very happy with the free version that felt guilty not get the paid version...thanks my friend your app is helping learn Russian much faster!
Fabulous
Does the job and then some more! Big thanks to the author for such a great tool.
It's the easiest one to use that I've found so far
I like that it lets me save my spots in a bunch of different books. It streamlines my books. Very affordable. Will keep supporting this app. Thank you.
Great app
Most of the important features for an audio book player. Would like a lock button.
Love it. Does exactly as advertised. Been using the free version. Not forced into upgrading but I did because of how many hours of easily listening this app has given. Thank you!
Easy to use and far and away the best audiobook app for Android. Loved the free app so much that I got the paid version to support the developer.

Fantastic "simple" audiobook reader. Previous to this app used the music player app bundled with my Samsung phone. Made playing long audio books a nightmare. This app has transformed the way I use my phone as now it's become a really addictive audio book player. Allows me to work and listen to a book! The player is very clearly laid out without any fancy or annoying graphics, and easy to understand. Love it! Paid for the full version.

Honestly near perfect. It looks fantastic. Tons and tons of great features. Speed settings, easy to switch between books, great color scheme let's you save battery, looks clean, multiple skip settings. Only problem is that timed pauses have to be set each time (for if you fall asleep) instead of automatically.
Works great for downloaded media (audiobooks, mp3...). Love the 10 sec forward or rewind and BIG buttons while driving. The black background is not distracting while driving either.
I love this app. It's simple and does most everything I want. I just wish it had a repeat button.

Work well. Small tip: Keep all your books in one place (folder) and then each book in its own folder. This helps the app read books properly and if the book is cut into pieces it will know to play them one after the other and show them as chapters.

Simple and fab. Have just paid for the full version, not because I needed to, but because I wanted to support the developers. The free version did everything I needed it to (and with no ads!) but went for the full version. Was having so much hassle listening to audio books with other players, but this just works.. What more can you ask for really? üëçüòä

Very happy with it. I even bought the paid version. It's taken over from Mort Audiobook Player as my favourite audiobook player now it seems to be out of development. I love how simple this player is and thus very fast. I highly recommend this app to all fans of audiobooks. ‚ô•Ô∏è
Cor! Dunhalf pay music and books good! Good features too.

The developer has reached out to me and will re-add playing WMA Lossless files. Such responsiveness is worth 4 stars. I'll wait until I am told the files are now playable, and I will make it 5 stars. OK, 5! WMA Lossless now working again. Thank you!
replyContent:
I removed WMA Lossless support a while ago. I will bring it back in the next update. Contact me at simple.abp@gmail.com and I can provide you with it immediately.
Update:
New version is now available in the Play Store.

content: Love the options. I really like being able to set the playback speed and being able to set up a default speed. But, I sometimes like to just shut it off, not just pause, and the only way I see is to open up the app and select exit. Is there an easy way to do this? Samsung S7. Correction: Yeap, there is. Sort of. On mine, which I didn't see before, there is a little down arrow, once I touch that the X is visable. Not exactly what I was looking for, but certainly better than before. Thanks
replyContent:
There is an "X" button in the notification, it does the same thing as "Exit" menu item.
Edit: can you send me a screenshot? My e-mail is simple.abp@gmail.com .

content: Well done. Pleasure to use

This is exactly what it says... "simple", however it has all the features you need. Thank you for providing both a free application and paid-for application. I could have used the free application and been just fine, however how much I use this app and how well it works, you deserve to take my money! Keep up the great work! In response to a previous review regarding this app not supporting wma, if this is even still an issue, you can simply convert the wma to mp3 and be good to go!

This was purchased for an elderly man so it needed to be simple. Unfortunately, there was no easy or clear way to list all of the books available on the device. You had to search through the file locations in the memory. Too complex for him.

Way better than Audible. All the features and cos it isn't trying to force you into a monthly fee you don't need your fingernail to select them. I really appreciate that you can choose a black or white display. Love the setting that makes it stop after a chosen no. of minutes since I listen to books to fall asleep
Needs Android Auto support for perfection.

Love it. Has everything I need and nothing extra. It just works :) It was a lovely surprise seeing the long m4b file I was listening to in the free version being divided into separate chapters in the paid version. You are awesome for not putting ads in the free version. Thank you.
Simple yet powerful user interface
TOP!
Simple Does the job Dark mode No complains
ExactlY what the name says: A simple audiobook player thet doesnt occupy much memory and doesnt try to pester/trick you into costly abbonements.

I have a question. How do you add an image to a book as art cover? The option is grayed out, not available. If you answer this question within 3 days, I'll raise my rating to 5 stars. Thanx in advance, cheers.
replyContent: That option is for showing book cover, not for adding it. Support for book covers is limited in the current version. For now, you can copy an image into the book folder and restart the app. If an image file is already there or one of the chapters contains an image, it will be picked up automatically.

content: Very good, because with this app I can use the touch function of my bluetooth headphones to seek forward or backwards any number of seconds I choose through the app settings. Thank you, developers!
Perfect, just what I needed for listening to several audiobooks simultaneously. Got full version to support developer.

I really love how simple the interaction with app. Indeed the philosophy behind this app is to avoid the clutter wherever possible. It worked with my headphone Bluetooth controller. You don't need to get the full version to enjoy it but I believe buying is one the ways of supporting good stuff like this.
It is a useful app. Thank you a lot for option to export bookmarks as .txt file. Very handful! Now I can promote this app among my students because is a key app for my classes :)
Perfect player for audiobooks. Haven't seen any annoying popup messages asking to rate the app. Moe pochtenie
Great player Use it for at St Helens sermons and music. Like the simple interface with loads of useful features. Updated often!

Very happy with this. Was using the free version and decided to support the author by buying the... not free version. I love the uncluttered look, it's fast, and no bugs that I've seen. And NO ADS! Perfect.
Great app! Wish Audible worked like this.
Just perfect
Great playback features. I'd rather manually download podcasts and listen to them from here than use a dedicated podcast player.
Minimal in a good way and very functional for audiobooks.

Great minimalist app, no extra overhead. Works very smoothly. I bought paid subscription for creator support. Dear author, do you plan to add repeat/loop playback feature or casting feature in the future?

content: First class audiobook player.
Excellent. Solved my problem of carrying an iPod with me. Love it.

content: Simple it is. Easy to use. One request is to acknowledge bookmarks when the icon is touched.

content: The free version was so good, I bought it even though I didn't need the added functionality. WARNING! content: Thank you for providing a free version so distilled and nag free!

love this player. simple, thoughtful functional

content: Absolutely love it! i drive like 2000mil per month, this app allows me to play all the mp3 audio books i have stored on my computer.

don't need paid version, but bought anyway to support good app development.
best reader for the price. thanks for making a great app

great app, does everything you expect from a solid audiobook app and more without any of the bloat
very simple and effective interface. best book player I know of. thanks very much.

content: does everything i hoped for!
Best audiobook player I've found.

Audibles player but with extra intuitive features. I love the app but if I wes attempting to improve it further I think adding a per chapter timer to the shake and go option would work well. say 30min=>end.of.chapter*shake*=>20min=leanth of current chapter.
the free version is simply perfect! but I bought the full version to say THANK YOU to the developers :)
In my opinion the best app for audio books, easy to use, with all the features I need. Very simple design. I like it.

Simple and effective. Does exactly what you expect from an app like this. Bought the paid version to support the developer, but the free version works also great. A legend for the abbreviations would be an addition

Great app. Would give it 5 stars if more documentation (how to use features and how they operate) was available, even if on the web. If it is available, I sure would like to find it. Simply the best player for my needs. Smart, comfortable design. Continuous improvements. Latest UI changes are brilliant. The author deserves support.

The perfect app for listening to audiobooks. Clear user interface and all required options available. This player works flawlessly. I bought the paid version as I was so impressed with the free one. An easy five stars :-)
Does what you need it to in with a straight forward and fast interface. I wish the Audible player was this responsive.
Simple, big button interface, so easy to use, great work, thanks devs. Highly recommended if you need this kind of app for listening to successive mp3 files.
I love this app. it just works so well, bought the full version just now but have been using the free for a few months. Best Audiobook player I think.

Edit 02/18/19 I change my rating from a 2 to a 5. I don't know if it's an upgrade with this app or Chrome OS going to 72 (which had huge changes) but now portait mode works the way it should. The people behind the app contacted me and they were concerned about my problem and wanted to correct it. If you have the free version, splurge and get the paid, these people have earned it! LQLarry It's probably a good app but id doesn't work with a 2 in 1 chromebook. I was asked to explain what wasn't working correctly by Google (I think) so here is my problem. Landscape mode worked the way it should, I think, but portait mode did not give me all the buttons I needed to make the app functional. Nothing after the timing bar. No play/pause, no forward, no back back. Since I read mostly in portait mode this makes the app useless. I use another app that works good and I have no problems with it. I did purchase the Simple AudioBook Player and they hae said that they would refund me if I choose. The price is affordable so I'm not worried about the refund and it says tons about mdmt wanting to work with me so if they can get it to work I'll test it. I've read nothing but praise so it has to be a decent app to get a 4.8 rating.
replyContent: If you are interested in fixing this problem or getting a refund, write me at mdmt.bh4e@gmail.com.

content: You can't ask for any better UI for an Audiobook app. I have been using it daily for months and I am amazed every single time I use it how well it is designed and built.
this is pretty much my favourite app.. all kinds of audio and the audio book aspect is unbeatable

Near perfect, simple audio book or podcast (mp3 etc) player - keeps bookmarks for any episodes I have already started, ability to jump forwards or backwards in small increments to relisten to a sentence, no unnecessary features, very easy to use, no ads. Do you have a way to donate?
Best audio book player IMO. Would like a repeat track feature if possible. Thanks for writing a great app!

Perfect, does exactly what it says on the tin. Absolutely no bloating. Upgrading from free version is a breeze, every setting and progression is remembered and free version will automatically uninstalls when you reopen it. Excellent additional features, like automatically going back a second or two when a notification plays. No advanced setup required. Didn't need the extra features of the paid version, I just use it so much and love it, the dev deserves at least the two bucks.
I actually only need the free version but appreciate the fact that you didn't use ads. Terrific design.

The free app is fabulous but this advanced version is worth the tiny sum charged if for no other reason than it plays m4b files perfectly. It's incredibly easy to use and has all the features I need. Thank you developer.

Having tried many book players over the past few years and settled with two primary players because of options, I have finally found perfection in functionality in this player. I cannot find any fault at all while putting it through its paces. The icing on the cake might be to have a permanent book cover display option for all books , but if this request might hamper functionality, then forget my suggestion. Well Done to the author of a great product!
Easy to use, straightforward - does everything it needs to do very well. Excellent app!
Can this app import a zipped file containing .m4b files? What about a zipped file containing .Mp3 files? Or must the audio files be in unzipped format? Thank You.
replyContent: Hello. Simple ABP doesn't support .zip archives.

content: Great audiobook player. Tried several but this is the best. Simple, east, dark mode, when system notification interrupts playback then playback pauses and automatically resumes playback about 1 second prior to the interruption. Great support. Big buttons, easy progress meter.
Absolute quality!
Loved how clean and easy this app is to use. Did not purchase for extra features, just wanted to show my appreciation for an excellent app.
Clean and simple. Only downside is missing search buttons on the lock screen.
replyContent: You can reveal them by swiping down with two fingers on the notification.

content: I wrote a previous review in haste saying that I was unable to locate a m4b file on my device. It was 100% my error. I was looking in the wrong place. The app works fine. The file structure is a little wonky, but if you look under/storage instead of /sdcard you will find your book on the sdcard.
replyContent: Have you tried looking under "/storage"?

content: This Audiobook Player is excellent!! In all the years that I've been using Android this is the first time I actually went to the paid version, not because I wanted the extra features, but as a way to thank the app's developer for a superior job. Thank you so much!!
Very good player
Simple!
Great app. The best audiobook player on the Store.

This app is just the business! It is clearly written by someone who knows 
about audio book listening. Simple to use with a great feature that will 
nudge the narative back a tad if your phone makes a notification beep or 
ding. The book mark is another good feature. I shall now look forward to 
listening to my audio books on a dedicated player. Thank you.

Excellent would love to be able to cast to devices as welll excellent peice 
of software 5 stars

Lightweight app that does exactly what it should. File browser could be a 
bit more organized but other than that 5 stars

I listen to 3-4 audiobooks per month, & I was looking for something to listen to my non-Audible audiobooks.  This works fine, but there is nothing about it that warrants its price tag given similar free products.
Excellent App, easy to use. 10/10
Perfection

Best player I have found. My only problem is that it is too easy to 
accidentally hit one of the progress indicator bars, causing us to lose the 
point we were at and have to search. I use the app in my car and the large 
buttons are what make this ideal. Is there any way we can disable the 
progress indicators, or maybe make it so they require a long press or 
something?
replyContent: You can always undo accidental position change by selecting "Undo seek" in the main menu.

content:
Exactly what I had been looking for. No other player has controls like 
these. Plus volume increase! Could not be better.

This audiobook player is absolutely the best on the Play Store. The FREE 
version is perfectly usable and full of excellent useful settings. I've 
used this app for a couple of years now and just decided to purchase it 
because the developer actually responded to a question I sent him :)

This is a really great audio player book app. Has very simple, but flexible, BIG controls for pause, play, stop, etc. Great interface and flexibility.  Developer very responsive to an issue I raised and was able to quickly fix, which I appreciate it.  I initially had the free version, but bought the Pro version even though I didn't even need its added functionality just as a small thank you for his quick response.

The only app I could find with 3.5x sound speed. Also, upon removing and 
attaching headphones the app auto pauses and returns to the last point 
listened minus a second. Great app with a lot of subtle and useful features 
other more popular apps just don't have.
Simple interface easy to use
Very good interface, easy to use, love it.
Simple,  clean ui which uses a dark mode as default as every one should.  Plays all file types I have tried. Excellent work.
Battery conservative, excellent playback and bookmarks and simple.  What more can you ask? Worth it.
Please add statistics functions like with Audible. How much time doesn't on what.
Great work. All important features are there, no clunky overhead or fancy designs. Nice and puristic.
Can I backup my bookmarks? How (I could not find the save location)?
This is the best Audiobook Player I never found before , thank you very much mdmt for excellent apps. Thanks
I didn't need any of the paid features but this app is amazing, wanted to show some support. Keep it up!

I got this app because I wanted to listen to my audio books without it being interrupted if I wanted to answer a message or something like that this filled the bill. I mean I got the free version and then I liked it so much that I went ahead and I got the paid version it's well worth the couple bucks to get the paid version and it's a great little app.
Functional, and minimalist design. Good features, and widgets for desktop screen.

Was surprised when saw file size. This app is made for use by somebody who knows how to listen audio books :)  Appreciate your work! Don't know what's the difference between free and payed version, but it worth every cent!
Doesn't work with Android Auto. But good apart from that
inactivity pause dosnt work
replyContent: Hello. Can you send me a screenshot of your settings?

content: All needed features available.
I tried the free version and it works well without any unnecessary clutter and was the best for my needs. Easy to move the books around and navigate the interface. So I bought it.
Great app. Best I have found to play my audio books.
Simple and easy to use.
ui should be better

Good player for books and learning languages (it has an ability to slow down the track). Much more useful then Listen Audiobook player. Better interface. Only one problem is waiting for solution: correct showing covers embedded in mp3 for each track (not for folders).
